kpi.content_comparator_kpi:
Visitor navigates to page You must select a conversion page before you can save the A/B test. You cannot select an unpublished page as your conversion goal page. You cannot select the page you are testing as the conversion goal page.
Choose a page, this is the page that a user must click on in order to count as a conversion. Results: Views are the number of visitors that visit the page under test. Conversions are the number of visitors that clicked through to the landing page at any point in the future while the test was running.' Landing Page
Conversion goal Visitor navigates to page

config_markup.conversion_label: Number of minutes until another page is visited
config_markup.error_invalid_timeoutvalue: Number of minutes must be a value between 1 and 60

stickysite_kpi.description: Converts when a user visits the content under test and then visits any other page within the same browser session. Results: Views are the number of visitors that visited the web page. Conversions are the number of visitors that clicked through to any other page within the specified time.
stickysite_kpi.name: Site Stickiness

readonly_markup.conversion_selector_description: Visitor navigates to any other page within {0} minutes.
